subject: URGENT !! Testing Professionals Required in 5 Domains Needed in Bangalore !!!
msgSnippet: HI All, We are one of the Leading Management Consulting Firm in India With 6 Branches in India and 2 in The US Market. We are Looking for testing Professionals
messageBody:
HI All,

We are one of the Leading Management Consulting Firm in India With 6
Branches in India and 2 in The US Market. We are Looking for testing
Professionals from all Over the Country for one of our Premier Client
in Bangalore !!

So do go through the the Requirement and do reply If you are
intrested to hric@... ASAP ....

______________________________________________________________________
Position 1:

Job Title Quality/Performance Engineer

TOTAL YEARS OF EXPERIANCE: 1.5 Yrs - 3 Yrs

Essential Functions

Technical Responsibilities :

Develop and update test plans for a particular feature area to
reflect all functionality specified for a given release in an MRD
 Actively participate in and contribute to product feature
discussions among Engineering and Product Management teams
 Develop and update test automation programs based on test
plans that are robust, maintainable, extensible, efficient, and
understandable.
 Execute test plans and write products defects in eBiz
 Execute automated test programs and analyze results
General Responsibilities
 Read and understand MRDs from Product Marketing and design
documents from Development
 Provide timely and accurate work and progress status via the
quality system, status reports, and weekly meetings


Special Skills or Knowledge

 Engineer and above.
 Consistently exceeded proficiency requirements and
performance expectations of previous level. Consistently exhibited
behaviors and performance aligned with Siebel Core Values
 Understanding of SQL databases, XML, HTML, J2EE, .Net
preferred.
 Programming experience in C, C++, Java, or equivalent test
automation language
 Experience with quality automation tools is desirable A MUST
 Ability to deliver high quality results in work product
 Attention to detail
 Effective written and verbal communication skills
 Strong organizational skills
 Must be a self-starter


Domain Expertise:

TIBCO domain  15-20people required with the above specs.
IBM Web sphere Business Integration (WBI) DOMIAN - 5 - 10 people
required with the above specs.
Microsoft Biztalk Domain  5 - 10 people required with the above
specs.
See beyond domain  5 - 10 people required with the above specs.
______________________________________________________________________

POSITION 2.

Job Title Senior Quality/Performance Engineer

Years of Relevant Experience 2.5  4.5 years

Essential Functions

Technical Responsibilities

 Develop test plans that verify a funtionality operates as
specified in MRDs, and that ensure the appication behaves properly in
the face of unintended usage
 Design, develop, and execute automation scripts that reflect
the test plans

Leadership Responsibilities

 Mentor team members
 Interview and assist in the recruitment of new employees
 Assist in the training and assimilaton of new employees
General Responsibilities
 Establish a working relationship with Engineering and Product
Marketing counterparts
 Review product documentation related to a feature area and
verify that the documentation accurately reflects product
functionality
 Provide timely and accurate work progress via status reports
and weekly meetings

Special Skills or Knowledge

 Consistently exceeded proficiency requirements and
performance expectations of previous level. Consistently exhibited
behaviors and performance aligned with Siebel Core Values
 Engineering or above a must
 Programming experience in C, C++, Java or equivalent test
automation language
 Experience with SQL database, XML, HTML, J2EE and .Net
 Demonstrated expertise in two or more relevant areas of
technology
 Demonstrated expertise in relevant procedures and methodolgy
 Demonstrated abilty to design and program test plans and
scripts that effectively test a product Demonstrated expertise with
one or more quality automation tools
 Demonstrated expertise in one or more complex software
products (Siebel or other)
 Siebel knowledge should include a solid understanding of the
Siebel architecture and a broad range of product features
 Demonstrated ability to deliver high quality results in work
product
 Attention to detail
 Excellent written and verbal communication skills
 Excellent organizational skills
 Must be a self-starter

Domain Expertise:

TIBCO domain  5 people required with the above specs.
IBM Web sphere Business Integration  (WBI) DOMIAN -5 people required
with the above specs.
Microsoft BizTalk Domain  5 people required with the above
specs.
See beyond domain  5 people required with the above specs.
______________________________________________________________________

Looking forward to hear from you ASAP ....


Rgds,
Rohit Menon
011-36983558

NOTE: Kindly Feel Free To Call Me Up in Case Of Any More
Information....
